msbt.message: So, do you have any particular look in mind when you choose furniture for your home, ? I just want to understand how your mind works, because I think I like what you've got going on here!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Were you thinking of local fungi when you were designing your ? <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Whatever your inspiration was, it makes me think "fairy-tale forest."
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />It feels cooler in here, thanks to your !<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Aren't you worried your furniture might melt in here, though?

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />So you like zen-themed furniture? What a relaxing-looking style<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I'm inspired by the look. I hope you don't mind if I try it out in my home.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />It's great how you've used this playful approach, making your . <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Reminds me of long afternoons spent building with blocks when I was younger,
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Your is so timeless!<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Makes me think of heirlooms passed down through generations
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Feels like I'm back in school, here by your .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Our cozy library Those book fairs Arts and crafts

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I feel like we're on some exotic vacation, just looking at your . <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I can almost smell the salt spray Hear the wind in the palm fronds And you can enjoy all that indoors!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />It feels so professional here I think that's because of your . <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />It makes this seem like somewhere that a lot of work is getting done.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Your A DIY project of yours?So rustic, A bit of log-cabin charm that makes your home feel like a mountain getaway. <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Suddenly, I want to sip hot chocolate by a roaring fire.
<20_2 arg="10" />I really love the style of your !<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />It's great that you like the same kind of cheery fun that I'm drawn toward.
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Is that sweet smell coming from your there?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="6" />I feel like it could be That's one refreshing-looking piece of decor!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I love the nostalgic look of your !<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />A bit of collectible, retro kitsch can really brighten up a home.
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />It feels so fun in here with your !<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />It's good to stay playful. Hold on to a sense of wonder and keep dreaming!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />You must really love beachcombing, . Just look at your here! <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />It's like you brought back a pail of the seashore to keep in your home!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I bet you're really proud of your .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I like the design, and the wood gives this piece a warm, inviting feel.
